name: My Aquarium
description:
My Aquarium is a relaxation software that let's you create your own Aquarium without the hassle of dealing with changing filters or making a mess! Cultivate and admire your very own tank of tropical fish on your PlayStation®3 system!

Mix and match decorations of your aquarium using over 40 different objects and various terrains to create your own unique tank. Then, choose your inhabitants from more than 50 selections centered on tropical fish! Mind you, you will adopt them as an infant, and they will get bigger as they reach adulthood! With that in mind, you can place up to 100 of them in a single tank! Now, just observe them as they go about their aquatic lives.
